comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: blog.esuteru.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).


## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/166924) if other issue.

issue.title: blog.esuteru.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).


## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/166924) if other issue.

issue.title: m.inven.co.kr

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

comment.body:
The extension does work fine on my end. Try to check it with the latest version.
Besides, the popup about `Rule limits` is not related to the filters. Read his message (it should be clickable) or in the settings.
If you still have questions about `Rule limits`, you can ask them [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardBrowserExtension/issues).

Not reproduced on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

issue.title: blog.esuteru.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).


## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/166924) if other issue.

comment.body: I can now reproduce and disabled.

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: In progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;

### Ad Blocking

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

I have noticed this mobile app banner on FlowGPT website.

<details><summary>Screenshot</summary>

![Screenshot from 2024-10-27 14-08-51](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/228726c5-4396-42e4-a91f-89b6de6048fb)

</details>


To fix this simply add the following rules:
```
flowgpt.com##+js(set-local-storage-item, appDownloadModal.Dismissed.home, true)
flowgpt.com##+js(set-local-storage-item, appDownloadModal.Dismissed.p, true)
```
This existing rule probably does no longer apply (manually tested): 
```
flowgpt.com##+js(set-local-storage-item, appDownloadModalDismissed, true)
```


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: flowgpt.com: tracking
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

N/A

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://flowgpt.com

### Ad Blocking

EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. `||data-ingestion.flowgpt.com^` heavy data collection, dozens of network request/min
2. `||flowgpt.com/marketing/` not necessarily a tracking domain. but blocking this greatly speeds up page load time as this prevents loading of useless heavy marketing and first party advertisement (e.g. app install banners). disallowing may break the carousel component which you may need to hide with an additional cosmetic filtering. but for me it was working okay.
3. `||flowgpt.com/mp/track` more tracking
4. `||tianji.flowgpt.com^` loads some tracking scripts. blocking this domain entirely prevents loading of those scripts and further network requests. works flawlessly from my testing past two weeks. however, inferring from the domain name, it may cause breakage in future.
5. `||awswaf.com/*/telemetry` flowgpt uses AWS WAF for PoW verification of your browser. blocking awswaf entirely will prevent you from being able to converse. but any site uses awswaf collects some rather harmless metrics. But the problem is AWS does this continuously in background, even when you aren't present with a "not a bot" challenge. Blocking this has no adverse side effects and on the contrary this saves lots of bandwidth on globally any website making use of awswaf (e.g. huggingface.co).

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: flowgpt.com: tracking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

N/A

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://flowgpt.com

### Ad Blocking

EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. `||data-ingestion.flowgpt.com^` heavy data collection, dozens of network request/min
2. `||flowgpt.com/marketing/` not necessarily a tracking domain. but blocking this greatly speeds up page load time as this prevents loading of useless heavy marketing and first party advertisement (e.g. app install banners). disallowing may break the carousel component which you may need to hide with an additional cosmetic filtering. but for me it was working okay.
3. `||flowgpt.com/mp/track` more tracking
4. `||tianji.flowgpt.com^` loads some tracking scripts. blocking this domain entirely prevents loading of those scripts and further network requests. works flawlessly from my testing past two weeks. however, inferring from the domain name, it may cause breakage in future.
5. `||awswaf.com/*/telemetry` flowgpt uses AWS WAF for PoW verification of your browser. blocking awswaf entirely will prevent you from being able to converse. but any site uses awswaf collects some rather harmless metrics. But the problem is AWS does this continuously in background, even when you aren't present with a "not a bot" challenge. Blocking this has no adverse side effects and on the contrary this saves lots of bandwidth on globally any website making use of awswaf (e.g. huggingface.co).

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
